name: scriptboard-endpoints-test
description: Test of the Scriptboard orchestrator endpoints implemented in WO-FILE-DISCOVERY-ENHANCEMENT-001
scope: Testing only - validate new endpoints work correctly

context.prerequisite: Backend server must be restarted to load new endpoints

test_plan: Test GET /workorders-master - should return data from assistant/workorders.json
Test GET /internal-workorders - should detect plans with workorder_id but no communication.json
Test GET /stale?days=7 - should detect plans older than 7 days
Test GET /plans?stale_days=7 - should include stale flag
Test GET /stats - should include stale_count and internal_count
Test POST /register-internal - should add internal workorder to workorders.json
expected_outcome: All endpoints return valid JSON responses with correct data
